snippet: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway said on Friday that quarterly profit had declined 4 percent, falling short of analysts’ forecasts.
abstract: Warren E Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway says quarterly profit declined 4 percent, falling short of analysts' forecasts; first-quarter net income fell to $4.71 billion, or $2,862 per Class A share, from $4.89 billion, or $2,977, year earlier; quarterly operating profit fell nearly 7 percent to $3.53 billion, or $2,149 a share, from $3.78 billion, or $2,302 a share.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway said on Friday that quarterly profit had declined 4 percent, falling short of analysts’ forecasts.
